above - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.controller.ElementBody
 
act(float, float, Object) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.model.BehaviourModel
This method calculates the direction of the movement of the enemy will make, according to a number of variables exterior to it.
act(float, float, Object) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.model.FollowerBehaviourModel
Calculates the distance between the enemy and the hero and, if that distance is less than the ACTIVE_DISTANCE, besides changing the active state of the enemy, it will also calculate the x and y coordinates of the new direction to move the enemy to, following the hero.
act(float, float, Object) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.model.WallWalkerBehaviourModel
Based on the current direction of the enemy, it calculates the velocity of the enemy.
act(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.BatView
If the bat isn't sleeping (just one sprite), it calls the super method to change the frame of the animation of the flight.
act(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.BulletView
Overriding method.
act(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.ElementView
Updates the frames of animations.
act(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.EnemyView
Changes the frame of the animation.
act(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.HeroState
 
act(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.HeroStateJumping
Overloading of the method act, it only increments the stateTime and sets the flip on the sprite.
act(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.HeroView
Calls the current state act method.
act(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.MapTileView
Override method.
act(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.SnailView
